name: EDD Civic Center Neighborhood Access Point
description: This is an access office of the Office of Economic and Workforce Development for the Tenderloin areas. Services provided include Job Search Assistance, Career Planning and Exploration, Job Preparation, Access to Education and Training as well as provides access to computers, internet, fax machines and copy machines. Workshops and services change monthly. All services are free of charge. - More Information: https://www.sf.gov/get-job-and-career-services
